title: The Tribe
overview: Deaf-mute Sergey enters a specialized boarding school for the deaf-and-dumb. In navigating through the school's hierarchy, he encounters a corrupt underbelly of criminality, known as The Tribe. By participating in several robberies, he gets propelled higher into the organization, when he meets one of the Chiefâ€™s concubines Anya, and unwittingly breaks all the unwritten rules of the group.
